page.title: 17Tourism around Langho
page.content: Tourism is in its infancy here but is being encouraged by an association of local guest house owners . Langho is really on the very edge of the tourist area , situated as it is on the borders of industry and the scenic Ribble Valley . People stay at local hotels and guest house resteraunts . From this area it is easy to reach resorts such as Blackpool and Fleetwood on the Fylde Coast . Alternatively one can travel north into the " Trough of Bowland " and " Pendle Witch " country . Nearby historic Clitheroe and Whalley Abbey are of great historical interest to visitors though walking in the beautiful local countryside is the main attraction .
